content: jasie crochet baby blanket approximately 34 x 34 abbreviations chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet treble_crochet - treble_crochet fo - finish off skip - skip slip_stitch - slip_stitch beg - beginning space - space materials 24 oz soft pink caron simply soft worsted weight yarn 1 oz white caron simply soft worsted weight yarn size j crochet hook with soft pink chain 125 row 1 single_crochet in second chain from hook and in each chain across chain 1 turn row 2 skip first single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet *skip next single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * across chain 1 turn row 3-122 repeat row 2 border round 1 working in ends of row work 122 single_crochet along first side work 124 single_crochet along foundation chain work 122 single_crochet along second side work 124 single_crochet along row 122 chain 4 turn round 2 mesh row skip first single_crochet double_crochet in next single_crochet *chain 1 skip next single_crochet double_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around except in each corner work double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet chain 1 end round with chain 2 and do not skip a single_crochet join with slip_stitch to third chain of beg chain 4 chain 1 turn round 3 single_crochet in each double_crochet chain 1 space and chain 2 space around chain 3 turn note some folk are having trouble with this round this just means to single_crochet in each stitch around round 4 skip first 3 single_crochet work shell double_crochet 2 treble_crochet chain 1 2 treble_crochet double_crochet in next single_crochet *skip 3 single_crochet work shell in next single_crochet repeat from * around to last single_crochet in last single_crochet work double_crochet 2 treble_crochet chain 1 2 treble_crochet join with a slip_stitch to beg chain 3 fo weave in loose ends lacing with white chain 525 weave chain through mesh row tie ends into a bow clip tails every effort has been made to ensure the accuracy of these instructions we cannot be responsible for human error differences in individual stitching techniques or typographical errors copyright 2007 c l halvorson
